name: Snappy
description: Snappy is an content creation platform inspired by models like OnlyFans and Privacy, but with a difference: full integration with cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. The project seeks to offer greater security, anonymity and financial freedom for content creators and consumers. Vision To be the most reliable, accessible, and secure decentralized content creation platform, allowing creators to monetize their work fairly and without centralized intermediation. Mission Facilitate the creation, distribution, and monetization of digital content through the blockchain, providing financial freedom for creators and privacy for consumers.
